testcases.Name: Addition: -437 + -499
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: -437 + -499

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter -437
2. Press +
3. Enter -499
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows -936
